content: Encounter Photo Credit: Pexels Despite the crying baby, Jaimie heard the announcement, “Arriving — Union Station — Track12.” She picked up her leather satchel and stood, slinging the bag over her shoulder. Thankful for her Nikes, she ascended the stairs. A six block walk to her meeting awaited. Before leaving the station, a stop at Garretts for their famous popcorn was a must. She simply adored the caramel/cheese mix. While in line, the man in front of Jaimie turned and caught her eye. “Have we met?” he asked. She looked into his eyes and replied, “You look familiar, but, no. We don’t know each other at all.”
title: Encounter
